description: This file declares the prototypes for functions related to the Slap Sco Gallery object in the Service Logic Aggregation Plane (SLAP). It includes function declarations for creation, removal, initialization, enrollment of objects, and resetting the object, specifically for the Slap Sco Gallery component.

methods.name: SlapCreateScoGallery
methods.description: Creates a new Slap Sco Gallery object with given container, owner, and reserved contexts.

methods.name: SlapScoGalCreate
methods.description: Creates a new instance of the Slap Sco Gallery object.

methods.name: SlapScoGalRemove
methods.description: Removes the specified Slap Sco Gallery object.

methods.name: SlapScoGalEnrollObjects
methods.description: Enrolls objects within the Slap Sco Gallery object.

methods.name: SlapScoGalInitialize
methods.description: Initializes the Slap Sco Gallery object.

methods.name: SlapScoGalReset
methods.description: Resets the state of the Slap Sco Gallery object.
